item.description:
Great Food, Wine, Beer and a Raffle what could be better? 

 

2.12.11 UPDATE:  This event WILL sell out if you plan on going and haven't reserved/got your ticket we suggest that you do it soon.  All you have to do is call Magnolia Library Center, 978-525-3343 to reserve your ticket and then pay for it at the door.  Please remember to come back to the site and let us know that you are attending so we are looking for you!

Let's go check out the 2011 Tast of Magnolia. This is a fundraiser for Magnolia's Library and it is their biggest fundraiser, so come out and support the Library and have fun with our friends. It will be a Winter Wonderland in Magnolia.  We will be walking around sampling great food by local restaurants, don't forget the Wine and Beer samples also, casual dress. 

Time: We willl be meeting at 6:45, the event runs from 7:00-9:30pm

Cost: $30.00 in advance/$35.00 at the door.

  Note you are responsible for purchasing your own tickets.  Tickets are on sale at the Magnolia Library Center, 978-525-3343 & Extreme Truck and Auto, 14 Kondelin Rd. Gloucester MA.

We we will be in the entrance waiting for everyone to arrive, if you get there and can't find us, then walk in and I am sure you will be able to find us.  Please note we may not all be able to stay together as a group, if that doesn't work for you then this event may not work for you!

When you have gotten your ticket, remember to log back into the site and change your status to "have ticket" so we know to be looking for you!

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Please remember that if you have not paid your dues for this year, be prepared to pay them at this event.  If you need to find out if you owe money, please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event. Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup. Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in by the entrance or walk around and look for us.
item.why: It will be fun to sample all the dishes from local restaurants.
item.name: Taste of Magnolia
